products.title: Beko Integrated Tall Freezer White
products.description: The Beko BFFD3577 Integrated Tall Freezer has a 220-litre capacity that's ideal for larger households. It also features six clear storage drawers and two storage shelves to organise your shopping. Fast Freeze quickly freezes fresh food, preserving its taste and nutrients. Frost Free technology prevents ice build-up, saving you time and effort while freeing-up more storage space.

specs.dimensions: 177.5 x 54 x 54.5cm (H x W x D)

features: No need to defrost with frost free technology

products.title: Essentials Undercounter Fridge Silver
products.description: Keep your fresh food tasting great in the Essentials CUL55S20 Undercounter Fridge. It delivers an efficient performance, which is great for your pocket and the planet. Adjustable shelves let you store awkward shaped food products easily. Salad compartment keeps vegetables at their freshest. The reversible door gives you flexibility in kitchen layout.

products.title: Kenwood KTLD60X20 Tall Fridge
products.description: The Kenwood KTLD60X20 Tall Fridge combines 370-litre capacity with a sleek stainless steel finish. It includes 4 shelves, 4 door compartments and 2 salad crispers. Water dispenser keeps you hydrated. Super Cool function cools food quickly, while Multi-Airflow cooling ensures constant temperature. Automatic defrosting saves time. Audible door alarm helps you save energy.
features: Food freshness feature to keep your fruit and veg fresh
Fast chill rapidly lowers the temperature inside the fridge

products.title: BEKO BLSD3577 Integrated Tall Fridge
products.description: The Beko BLSD3577 Integrated Tall Fridge offers 309 litres of storage across shelves, balconies and a salad crisper. Chiller compartment keeps meat, fish and dairy at around 0 °C. Chrome wine rack stores drinks or bottles easily. Reversible doors provide flexibility. Quick Cool lowers the temperature rapidly, while Holiday Mode saves energy when you’re away. Open door alarm alerts you if the fridge is left open.

specs.dimensions: 177.5 x 54 x 54.5 cm (H x W x D)

features: Fast chill rapidly lowers the temperature inside the fridge
Open door alarm warns you if the door is left open

products.title: ZANUSSI MultiFlow ZRME38FW2 Tall Fridge White
products.description: The Zanussi MultiFlow ZRME38FW2 Tall Fridge uses MultiFlow technology to keep temperature stable and food fresher. 380-litre capacity offers plenty of storage. The flat door design gives a modern, seamless look.

specs.dimensions: 186 x 59.5 x 64.5 cm (H x W x D)

features: Food freshness feature to keep your fruit and veg fresh
Fast chill rapidly lowers the temperature inside the fridge

products.title: SAMSUNG UE50TU7020KXXU 50" Smart 4K Ultra HD HDR LED TV
products.description: The Samsung UE50TU7020KXXU 50" Smart 4K TV delivers pure colours, sharp contrast, and brilliant brightness. HDR displays the brightest and darkest colours realistically. Smart TV apps include Apple TV, Netflix, and Disney+. Adaptive Sound adjusts automatically for immersion. Game Enhancer reduces lag for smooth gaming. Premium One Remote controls all compatible devices.
